name: Freddy Pe√±a
title: Founder & Software Developer
bio: Founder of Alphnology, as a versatile professional, I bring more than 10 years of experience in software development in the Java ecosystem. My passion for open source software is reflected in my commitment as an active member of the Dominican Republic Java Community. In addition to my practical experience, as a professor at the School of Computer Engineering and Telecommunications of PUCMM, I share my knowledge in Java and Python, guiding students on their way to technical excellence.
